data.name: This is odd
data.description:
Create a function that checks if a number is odd.

Expect negative and decimal numbers too. Remember... all negative numbers can also be either odd or even.

Decimal numbers always return false 

### Examples

```javascript
Example:
isOdd(2)--> false
isOdd(5)--> true
isOdd(4)--> false
isOdd(-17)--> true
isOdd(-7.0)--> true
isOdd(-7.1)--> false
isOdd(4.23)--> false
isOdd(5.0)-->true
isOdd(5.23)--> false
```
```ruby
Example:
is_odd(2)--> false
is_odd(5)--> true
is_odd(4)--> false
is_odd(-17)--> true
is_odd(-7.0)--> true
is_odd(-7.1)--> false
is_odd(4.23)--> false
is_odd(5.0)--> true
is_odd(5.23)--> false
```
```python
Example:
is_odd(2)--> false
is_odd(5)--> true
is_odd(4)--> false
is_odd(-17)--> true
is_odd(-7.0)--> true
is_odd(-7.1)--> false
is_odd(4.23)--> false
is_odd(5.0)--> true
is_odd(5.23)--> false
```
